import React, {useState} from "react"; import Row from 'react-bootstrap/Row' import Col from 'react-bootstrap/Col' import Form from 'react-bootstrap/Form' import Button from 'react-bootstrap/Button' import { useQuery } from "@apollo/client"; import { getAuthors } from "../graphql-client/queries"; const Forms = () => { const [newBook, setNewBook] = useState({ name: '', genre: '', authorId: '' }) const onInputChange = event => { setNewBook({ ...newBook, [event.target.value]: eve }) } const {loading, error, data} = useQuery(getAuthors) return
{loading ? (

Loading authors...

) : ( {data.authors.map(author => ( ))} )}
} export default Forms
